results.name: Table T(n,k) = n^k read by upwards antidiagonals (n >= 1, k >= 1).
comment: Sum of antidiagonals is A003101(n) for n>0. - _Alford Arnold_, Jan 14 2007
link: T. D. Noe, Rows n=1..50 of triangle, flattened
G. Labelle, C. Lamathe and P. Leroux, Labeled and unlabeled enumeration of k-gonal 2-trees, arXiv:math/0312424 [math.CO], 2003.
maple: seq(seq(T(1+d-k, k), k=1..d), d=1..11);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Apr 18 2020
mathematica: Table[n^(k - n + 1), {k, 1, 11}, {n, k, 1, -1}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 14 2012 *)
